## CreateIFFResult.addFixtures() method

Add fixtures to [rootDir](./inline-fixture-files.createiffoptions.rootdir.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addFixtures<const U extends Directory>(additionalDirectory: U): Promise<CreateIFFResult<Paths & FlattenDirectory<U>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  additionalDirectory | U | The definition of fixtures to be added. |
